attributes.action: COVID 19!! school online learning classes save children life  further EDUCATION.
attributes.additional_details: Because since school reopen from September  coronavirus spread again. School not manage social distance still students in higher risk...
attributes.background: Please us parents want our kids life be a save. We want our kids educated but the time is heard to save life and others. Best for the winter risk option all students school/ college education can done by online learning for 2th lockdown...

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Reclose schools and colleges due to increase in COVID-19 cases: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/550846

Require schools to support home learning during Covid-19 outbreak: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/334065

Suspend fines for school non-attendance during Covid-19 & allow parental choice: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551740

Close Schools and Colleges during a second nationwide lockdown: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557012
